summary: My attempt to create Daenerys Targaryen and Aegon I Targaryen.
descriptionHtml:
I think it is pretty obvious why someone would want to play the Dragonborn as a True Targaryen King or Queen.

Can\'t wait for a good purple eye mod comes out XD

Dany is not modeled exactly after Emilia Clarke in Game of Thrones. There is some resemblance, but her look is also influence by many concept arts found on the Internet.

Aagon is loosely based on the only drawing of him that you can find online.
author: rangert
